cause.description:
The Baylor International Pediatric AIDS Initiative welcomes your involvement and support. Charitable donations can be designated for any of the activities described, including our local and regional patient care and education programs, and our Romania Initiative. Baylor College of Medicine is a 501(c)(3) tax exempt organization. Contributions to the Baylor International Pediatric AIDS Initiative can be made payable and mailed to:
Baylor International Pediatric AIDS Initiative Texas Children's Hospital Clinical Care Center 6621 Fannin, CC 1210 Houston, TX 77030
www.BaylorAIDS.org
1. Collaborate on treatment, research, service, education, and health professional training in the fight against HIV/AIDS
cause.mission: conduct a program of high quality, high impact, highly ethical pediatric and family HIV/AIDS care and treatment, health professional training, and clinical research.
cause.name: Baylor Pediatric AIDS Initiative
